item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-12-13
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at J. Crew (Natick Collection) (1245 Worcester St, # 3080, Natick). #
  • I'm at Target (Framingham) (400 Cochituate Road, Framingham). #
  • I'm at Sweet Tomatoes Pizza (Newton) (47 Langley Road, Newton). #
  • A long day of shopping will wear anyone out. #
  • Just walked Sonoma, oh boy it's cold. #
  • Egg sandwich @ California Adventure #
  • RT: Foods experts won't eat (via @justinvincent) #
  • Waiting for the train @ Chestnut Hill #
  • I'm at L'Aroma Cafe (85 Newbury Street, Boston). #
  • I'm at Bouchee (159 Newbury St, Dartmouth, Boston). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
